formattedAddress: 232 W 80th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 232 W 80th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Bell was able to see me the day I called, as my PCP was unavailable.  He is kind, calm and gave me confidence to further explore an issue that I feared. He called me early the next morning with radiology results. I highly recommend him!

text.text: Dr. Bell was able to see me the day I called, as my PCP was unavailable.  He is kind, calm and gave me confidence to further explore an issue that I feared. He called me early the next morning with radiology results. I highly recommend him!

originalText.text: Dr. Bell, who is not my regular doctor, listened very patiently and intently during my two visits, and gave me very helpful, clear information. I recommend it to my husband that he would really like Dr. Bell as his PCP.

text.text: Dr. Bell, who is not my regular doctor, listened very patiently and intently during my two visits, and gave me very helpful, clear information. I recommend it to my husband that he would really like Dr. Bell as his PCP.

originalText.text: Ryan responded quickly to our request and called in a prescription for paxlovid to a local pharmacy that we were able to pick up immediately. He reviewed my current drug list and explained what drugs not to take with the paxlovid. For some reason the zoom link didn't function (I use it all the time for work, don't think the issue was on my end). We appreciate his assistance.

He reviewed my current drug list and explained what drugs not to take with the paxlovid. originalText.text: Dr.Bell is thorough and compassionate.  He engages with you as his patient in warm and kind manner.

text.text: Dr.Bell is thorough and compassionate.  He engages with you as his patient in warm and kind manner.

originalText.text: Dr. Bell was everything I was told (and hoped) he would be; pleasant; smart; listened carefully to what I was (and even what I was not) saying, as well as having a genuine interest in my healthcare.   He did not rush to conclusions and, being it was the first time we’d met, took extra time to understand my philosophy on preventative health.  I am very happy he accepted me under his care as a primary physician.  Thanks again!
